title: Google | L3 | Bangalore | Accepted
content:
Education: Btech in Computer Science from NIT
Years of Experience: 2years 7months
Prior Experience: Paypal
Date of the Offer: Feb 2022
Company: Google
Title/Level: Software Engineer 2 / L3
Location: Bangalore
Base Salary: 25L
PF+Gratutiy : ~3.3L
Relocation: 1.7L
Signing Bonus: 5L
Stock bonus: $61K stock grant vested over 4 years(33%,33%,22%,11%)
Bonus: 3.75L ~ 15% of base
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~54L for 1st year
Benefits: Standard google benefits
Other details: Negotiated once, original offer did not have signing bonus and stocks were lower. Had a counter offer from startup worth 57L. Google does not consider ESOPS of startup as part of counter offer. Had 3 fit calls with different teams. Went ahead with 1 of these.

Verdict: Accepted

Interview Experience :  3 coding rounds , 1 gogglyness. Each coding round had 1 leetcode hard question.
Questions were related to 
1. Meeting room problem with priority queue and sorted Set
2.  DFS with random function
3.  String Matching different approaches - open ended/vague question

I have solved around 450 questions on leetcode mostly sequentially, but did not find any of these in leetcode 1-400.
salaryTotal:
: ~54l For 1st Year
benefits: Standard Google Benefits
other Details: Negotiated Once, Original Offer Did Not Have Signing Bonus And Stocks Were Lower. Had A Counter Offer From Startup Worth 57l. Google Does Not Consider Esops Of Startup As Part Of Counter Offer. Had 3 Fit Calls With Different Teams. Went Ahead With 1 Of These.

verdict: Accepted

interview Experience : 3 Coding Rounds , 1 Gogglyness. Each Coding Round Had 1 Leetcode Hard Question.
questions Were Related To 
1. Meeting Room Problem With Priority Queue And Sorted Set
2. Dfs With Random Function
3. String Matching Different Approaches - Open Ended/vague Question

i Have Solved Around 450 Questions On Leetcode Mostly Sequentially, But Did Not Find Any Of These In Leetcode 1-400.

The offer is based on my current compensation. Tried negotiating as they are paying 15LPA -20LPA for candidates with same yoe. After a lot of discussion he agreed to increase base from 11 to 12. But now, they want me to  give another technical round just for getting offer letter with revised compensation. What should I do?
